statement.hint: Compare the numbers shown on each {shape1}.
Focus on tiles with the value {number1}.
Look for tiles showing the value {number1}.
Inspect the {color1Name} tiles and note their numbers.

statement.text: All {shape1}s with value {conditionWord} {numberThreshold} are {color1Name} and located in the {positionDescription} of the grid.
statement.hint: Pay attention to {shape1}s whose numbers are {conditionWord} {numberThreshold} and where they sit.

statement.text: All {shape1}s with {parity} values are {color1Name} and located in the {positionDescription} of the grid.
statement.hint: Check {shape1}s that have {parity} numbers and where they appear.

statement.text: All {shape1}s with values between {minValue} and {maxValue} are {color1Name} and located in the {positionDescription} of the grid.
All {shape1}s with {parity} values are {color1Name} and located in the {positionDescription} of the grid.
statement.hint: Check {shape1}s that have {parity} numbers and where they appear.

statement.text: All {shape1}s with prime values are {color1Name} and located in the {positionDescription} of the grid.
statement.hint: Prime numbers on {shape1}s might guide you.

statement.text: All {shape1}s with values that are multiples of {factor} are {color1Name} and located in the {positionDescription} of the grid.
statement.hint: Look at {shape1}s whose numbers are multiples of {factor} and where they sit.

statement.text: For all {shape1}s that are {color1Name}, there exists a {shape2} {valueConditionDescription} directly to the right of it.
statement.hint: See what sits immediately to the right of each {color1Name} {shape1}.

statement.text: For all {shape1}s that are {color1Name}, there exists a {shape2} {valueConditionDescription} directly to the left of it.
statement.hint: Check the tile directly left of each {color1Name} {shape1}.

computedFields.template: with a value greater than or equal to {valueThreshold}

statement.text: For all {shape1}s that are {color1Name}, there exists a {shape2} {valueConditionDescription} directly above it.
For all {shape1}s that are {color1Name}, there exists a {shape2} {valueConditionDescription} directly below it.
statement.hint: Inspect the tiles directly below each {color1Name} {shape1}.

statement.text: For all {shape1}s that are {color1Name}, there exists a {shape2} {valueConditionDescription} diagonally top-left of it.
statement.hint: Consider the tile diagonally top-left of each {color1Name} {shape1}.

statement.text: For all {shape1}s that are {color1Name}, there exists a {shape2} {valueConditionDescription} diagonally top-right of it.
statement.hint: Look at the tile diagonally top-right of each {color1Name} {shape1}.
